name: Many Golf
description:
This game was developed for Trijam 212, the 3-hour long gamejam, where the theme was "Too much".

You may know how to play mini-golf, but can you handle playing multiple games at once?

Using the mouse and virtual analog stick, you can define the direction and strength with which you hit the ball. However, you must consider that this will apply to every other mini-golf course on the screen!

======

This project was quite challenging. Although it ended up being very short, I managed to build something reasonably polished. Furthermore, I believe that this concept could be expanded in the future! Unfortunately, a nasty bug appeared at the end of the 3-hour development deadline, which ate into the time I had allocated for implementing audio.
